title: Rafic Hariri
summary: Rafic Bahaa El Deen Al Hariri[lower-alpha 1] (Arabic: رفيق بهاء الدين الحريري‎;  Arabic pronunciation: [rafiːq al ħariːriː]  1 November 1944 – 14 February 2005) was a Lebanese business tycoon and politician who served as the Prime Minister of Lebanon from 1992 to 1998 and again from 2000 until his resignation on 20 October 2004 (2004-10-20).
